detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved dress in fine-knit organic cotton with buttons at the back of the neck and a frill trim at the top that continues back over the shoulders. Seam at the bottom and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short vest top in ribbed jersey in a narrow cut at the top with visible seams front and back.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a round neckline, opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Slightly shorter jersey top with a print motif, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Short jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short, fitted dress in soft satin with an adjustable drawstring around the neckline and covered elastication at the shoulders to create a gathered effect. Horizontal, gathered seams with concealed elastication on the bodice to create a draped effect, and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, an opening with ties at the back of the neck and short, flounced sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Court shoes in a cotton canvas slub weave with toes covered in shimmering metallic canvas. Open sides and covered block heels with round metal studs at the base. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 7 cm.
Long-sleeved blouse in a cotton poplin weave with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs and a yoke with tiered mesh flounces that continue over the shoulders.
Cardigan in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, press-studs down the front, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tops in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a button placket, long, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem.

Wide, boxy windbreaker in crispy nylon with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and discreet front pockets with a concealed press-stud. Wide sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem. Lined.
Set with a cotton vest top and shorts. Vest top with a print motif on the front. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a print motif on one leg.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton flannel. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Cardigan in soft, patterned fine-knit cotton with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Wide shoulder straps, a low cut at the back and a wide, ribbed hem. Light support. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar and chest pocket. Easy-iron finish.
Printed vest top with narrow ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Skirt in a patterned viscose weave with side pockets and frill-trimmed, gathered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Blouse in an airy modal and cotton weave with hole embroidery at the top, short, elasticated raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a patterned weave with elastication at the top and an opening with twisted ties at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length, flounced sleeves. Unlined.
Fitted jumper in a rib-knit viscose blend with a collar, V-neck, long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Blouse in woven fabric with buttons down the front and a small stand-up collar with decorative lace flowers and narrow ties. Long sleeves and buttoned cuffs with lace flowers.
Double-layered tube scarf in patterned jersey. Width 35 cm, circumference 50 cm.
Striped trousers in a soft viscose weave with a sheen. Regular waist, concealed zip in the side, side pockets, a welt back pocket and wide, straight legs.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, concealed front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathers. No buttons. Lined.
Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Patterned top in airy, crinkled fabric with a wide lace trim at the hem. Narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck.
All-in-one suit in soft pile with matching, padded accessories. Hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, an open chest pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Mesh trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Loafers with tassels at the front, satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Brazilian briefs in jersey and lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, short sleeves and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Suit trousers in woven fabric containing some wool and linen with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. For the matching jacket, look for 0712079.

Cropped top in seersucker made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with elastication and a frill at the top, a sweetheart neckline and buttons down the front. Short, raglan puff sleeves with elastication and a frill trim.
Short dress in sturdy cotton jersey with an appliqué at the top, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and a wide, smocked seam at the waist.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams for added comfort, an elasticated waist, lined front and slightly longer legs.
Straight-style premium cotton jumper in a relaxed fit with a V-neck and ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem.

Set with a top and trousers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Relaxed fit joggers with an easy pull-on elasticated, drawstring waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and hem. Unlined.
Briefs in soft cotton jersey with wide, visible elastic at the waist and a lined gusset.
Shoulder bag in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a flap and concealed magnetic fastener. Narrow, adjustable shoulder strap with a metal buckle. Size 3.5x15x21 cm.

Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket jeggings in washed, stretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.

Ankle-length suit trousers in airy linen with a hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short top in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads. Shoulder straps and a double flounce at the top.
5-pocket, calf-length skirt in washed denim with worn details and a button fly. Open at the front.
Dance shoes in imitation leather with glittery elastic straps over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft jersey with long sleeves, and press-studs down the front and along one leg. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Brazilian briefs in jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a high waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined. The polyurethane content of the skirt is water-based and free from DMF.
Hooded top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle boots with a tongue and lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Chunky, patterned soles. Heel 5.5 cm. Platform 2.8 cm.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Top in soft slub cotton jersey with a heart-shaped chiffon appliqué on the front and long puff sleeves.
V-neck top in slub jersey with a lace yoke, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a fake back pocket. Contrasting colour stripes down the sides and decorative seams on the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and ties at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and raw-edge, frayed hems.

Parka in cotton twill with a lined, drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets with a press-stud and patch front pockets with a flap. Adjustable press-stud fastenings at the cuffs, a drawstring at the hem and a single back vent. Lined.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in satin with notch lapels, concealed buttons at the top and a seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt. Long puff sleeves, cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and pockets in the side seams. Zip fly and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Sports joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets.
Loose-fit pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft rib knit with a round neckline, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Coat woven in a viscose blend containing some wool with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole, buttons down the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Two flap front pockets, three inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Short-sleeved V-neck top in softly draping airy jersey with a slight sheen.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges, a concealed silicone trim at the top and long sleeves.
Nightslip in soft viscose jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, triangular lace cups and covered elastication and a lace trim under the bust.

Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved all-in-one-suit in soft, washed slub jersey made from organic cotton with a button placket and buttoned chest pocket. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
